body_html: Hi Marc, with the deprecation of sklearn compatibility in recent versions, how do you see the required changes? I tried wrapping the estimator with SKCompat to keep using x as argument but then I have problems down the line. It seems to me that keeping input_fn open as a generator would make perfect sense, especially for big (and streaming) data (not relying only on parsing TFrecords and such)

body: Hi Marc, with the deprecation of sklearn compatibility in recent versions, how do you see the required changes? I tried wrapping the estimator with SKCompat to keep using x as argument but then I have problems down the line. It seems to me that keeping input_fn open as a generator would make perfect sense, especially for big (and streaming) data (not relying only on parsing TFrecords and such)
